sourceOfFunds.purpose: Our academy currently has over 150 students attending training lessons on daily basis. The purpose of our academy is to provide learners with an opportunity to better themselves and their future by promoting sports as a way of life and to be disciplined. Professionals are called to hold seminars with the athletes on the topic of Motivation, healthy living , etc. We try making our wrestlers self dependent, mentally strong and dedicated to their sport.

Our academy students play very well in various tournaments and We have also seen measurable success through our academy Our players had participated in various National and International level Championships and won many competitions at State and National level One of our academys wrestler Miss Jaspreet Kaur got awarded with State Gold Medal under 23 championship We have received funds from vorporate entities such as Jamna Industries and spent on growth of players

address: Jan Shikshan Sansthan Mohali, B-52, Phase-VI, Industrial Area, Mohali District SAS Nagar(Mohali) PIN CODE 160055 (Punjab)
title: Jan Shikshan Sansthan Mohali
detailsOfAchievement: Jan Shikshan Sansthan Mohali has provided vocational skills training to 28856 beneficiaries in various courses since its inception in December 2000 till June 30, 2016. Most of the beneficiaries are self-employed while some are wage employed after completing their training. Of the total beneficiaries trained approximately 74 per cent were females, about 71 per cent of them belonged to socio-economically weak and educationally backward families. About 66 per cent of the total beneficiaries trained were either non-literates or neo-literates. JSS Mohali has also conducted a number of awareness activities on the following issues: - Promotion of literacy, especially female literacy - Drug de-addiction - Environment protection - Promotion of financial and legal literacy - Promotion of health and cleanliness (Swachhta) - Promotion of local Indian languages (Matri Bhasha) JSS Mohali has also actively participated in promoting various government schemes like Jan Dhan Yojana, Suraksha Bima Yojna, Mudra Yojana and Saansad Adarsh Gram Yojana.

detailsOfAchievement: Swami Vivekanand Medical Mission (Regd.) is working since past 40 years in the field of health conditions of the poor and weaker sections of the society. It started its first hospital in a remote locality of Islamabad, Amritsar in a single hired room at Chowk Rajputan in the year 1979. Presently, Five medical units namely Allopathic, Eyes, Dental, Physiotherapy and clinical laboratory, in a three storied building at 12- Makan (Islamabad) area of Amritsar, are attending around 200 patients daily.
